    • createAppointment

      public static Appointment createAppointment​(int newId, java.lang.String titleFieldText, java.lang.String descriptionFieldText, java.lang.String locationFieldText, java.lang.String typeFieldText, java.sql.Timestamp localEndTimestamp, java.sql.Timestamp localStartTimestamp, java.sql.Timestamp current_date, int contactId, java.sql.Timestamp utcStartTime, java.sql.Timestamp utcEndTime, java.lang.String created_by, java.lang.String last_updated_by, int customerId, int userId) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Creates a new appointment
      Parameters:
      localEndTimestamp - local time for end
      localStartTimestamp - local time for start
      newId - new id of appointment autogenerated
      titleFieldText - title
      descriptionFieldText - description
      locationFieldText - location
      typeFieldText - type
      contactId - contact id
      utcStartTime - utc
      utcEndTime - utc
      current_date - current date
      created_by - who created it
      last_updated_by - last updated time
      customerId - the customer id
      userId - the id
      Returns:
      new appointment
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception

    • validate

      public static boolean validate​(java.sql.Timestamp utcStart, java.sql.Timestamp utcEnd, int customerId, int appointmentId) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Validates appointment if it is in an available time
      Parameters:
      utcStart - the start time
      utcEnd - the end time
      customerId - id of who created it
      appointmentId - specific appointment
      Returns:
      true or false
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
